application:
Assistive Rehabilitation skeletonDumper Real App
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/skeletons-data --rxTime --txTime console
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/depth --type depth --rxTime --txTime console
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/opc-save --rxTime --txTime console
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/nav-save --rxTime --txTime console
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/gaze-save --rxTime --txTime console
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/skeletonretriever --rxTime --txTime console
Connection Camera
/cer/realsense_repeater/depthImage:o /yarpOpenPose/float:i fast_tcp+send.portmonitor+type.dll+file.image_rotation_d+option_rotate.rotate_cw
/yarpOpenPose/image:o /viewer/skeleton mjpeg
/cer/realsense_repeater/rgbImage:o /dump/skeletons-img fast_tcp+send.portmonitor+type.dll+file.image_rotation+option_rotate.rotate_cw
/yarpOpenPose/target:o /dump/skeletons-data fast_tcp
/skeletonRetriever/viewer:o /dump/skeletonretriever fast_tcp
/cer/realsense_repeater/depthImage:o /dump/depth fast_tcp+send.portmonitor+type.dll+file.image_rotation_d+option_rotate.rotate_cw
/opc/broadcast:o /dump/opc-save fast_tcp
/navController/state:o /dump/nav-save fast_tcp
/cer_gaze-controller/state:o /dump/gaze-save fast_tcp
/cer/laser/front:o /dump/lidar fast_tcp
Connection Robot
/cer/left_arm/state:o /dump/robot-left-arm fast_tcp
/cer/left_wrist_tripod/state:o /dump/robot-left-wrist-tripod fast_tcp
/cer/right_arm/state:o /dump/robot-right-arm fast_tcp
/cer/right_wrist_tripod/state:o /dump/robot-right-wrist-tripod fast_tcp
/cer/head/state:o /dump/robot-head fast_tcp
/cer/torso/state:o /dump/robot-torso fast_tcp
/cer/torso_tripod/state:o /dump/robot-torso-tripod fast_tcp
